DOC.brief_summary: Determine if different levels of acid-suppression with esomeprazole for 6 months on chosen histological markers of esophageal epithelial acid-related disease in patients with upper GI symptoms.
DOC.brief_title: HEARD (Long Term) Study - Histology of the Esophagus in Acid-Related Disease
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent 18 years or older history of upper GI symptoms Peptic ulcer disease upper gastrointestinal surgery malignancy
